languages.text: "Когда полыхнуло, мой отряд здесь был. {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Техножрецы{/g}, получающие данные со спутников, сообщили, что в системе замечены какие-то странные пустотные корабли. Крутились вокруг звезды, а затем один пошел на посадку на Райкад Маджорис. Господин губернатор на всякий случай повелел усилить охранение ключевых объектов — известное дело, если что-то странное творится, удваивай караулы. Нас по тревоге подняли и в звездную гавань послали. Только благодаря этому мы тут и отбились".

traits.locale_text: "Когда полыхнуло, мой отряд здесь был. {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Техножрецы{/g}, получающие данные со спутников, сообщили, что в системе замечены какие-то странные пустотные корабли. Крутились вокруг звезды, а затем один пошел на посадку на Райкад Маджорис. Господин губернатор на всякий случай повелел усилить охранение ключевых объектов — известное дело, если что-то странное творится, удваивай караулы. Нас по тревоге подняли и в звездную гавань послали. Только благодаря этому мы тут и отбились".

languages.text: "My unit was here when it all went to the groxes. The {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} linked to satellites reported sightings of strange voidships in the system. They were orbiting the star until one of them set course for landing on Rykad Majoris. The governor took precautionary measures and ordered to increase security at the key facilities — everyone knows that whenever something's not right, you better double the warden details. The alarm was raised, and we were sent to secure the starport. It's the only reason we were able to hold it."
languages.original_text: "Когда полыхнуло, мой отряд здесь был. {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Техножрецы{/g}, получающие данные со спутников, сообщили, что в системе замечены какие-то странные пустотные корабли. Только благодаря этому мы тут и отбились".

traits.locale_text: "My unit was here when it all went to the groxes. The {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} in charge of satellite data reported some strange voidships appearing in the system. They stayed near the star before one of them headed out to land on Rykad Majoris. The governor took precautionary measures and ordered to increase security for key facilities — everyone knows that whenever something's not right, you better double the guard details. The alarm was raised, and we were sent to secure the starport. It's the only reason we were able to hold."

"My unit was here when it all went to the groxes. The {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} in charge of satellite data reported some strange voidships appearing in the system. They stayed near the star before one of them headed out to land on Rykad Majoris. The governor took precautionary measures and ordered to increase security for key facilities — everyone knows that whenever something's not right, you better double the guard details. The alarm was raised, and we were sent to secure the starport. It's the only reason we were able to hold."

languages.text: "Meine Einheit war hier, als alles vor die Groxe gegangen ist. Die mit Satelliten verbundenen {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Techpriester{/g} haben berichtet, dass merkwürdige Raumschiffe im System gesichtet wurden. Sie sind im Orbit des Sterns geblieben, bis eines davon zur Landung auf Rykad Majoris angesetzt hat. Der Gouverneur hat Vorsichtsmaßnahmen ergriffen und befohlen, die Sicherheitsvorkehrungen in den wichtigen Anlagen zu verstärken. Jeder weiß, wenn etwas nicht stimmt, muss man die Wachschichten verdoppeln. Es wurde Alarm geschlagen und wir wurden losgeschickt, den Raumhafen zu sichern. Nur deswegen konnten wir die Stellung überhaupt halten."
languages.original_text: "My unit was here when it all went to the groxes. The {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} linked to satellites reported sightings of strange voidships in the system. They were orbiting the star until one of them set course for landing on Rykad Majoris. The governor took precautionary measures and ordered to increase security at the key facilities — everyone knows that whenever something's not right, you better double the warden details. The alarm was raised, and we were sent to secure the starport. It's the only reason we were able to hold it."

traits.locale_text: "Meine Einheit war hier, als alles vor die Groxe gegangen ist. Die mit Satelliten verbundenen {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Techpriester{/g} haben berichtet, dass merkwürdige Raumschiffe im System gesichtet wurden. Sie sind im Orbit des Sterns geblieben, bis eines davon zur Landung auf Rykad Majoris angesetzt hat. Der Gouverneur hat Vorsichtsmaßnahmen ergriffen und befohlen, die Sicherheitsvorkehrungen in den wichtigen Anlagen zu verstärken. Jeder weiß, wenn etwas nicht stimmt, muss man die Wachschichten verdoppeln. Es wurde Alarm geschlagen und wir wurden losgeschickt, den Raumhafen zu sichern. Nur deswegen konnten wir die Stellung überhaupt halten."

languages.text: « Mon unité était là quand ça a commencé à partir en grox. Les {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}technoprêtres{/g} liés aux satellites ont signalé d'étranges vaisseaux spatiaux dans le système, orbitant autour de l'étoile jusqu'à ce que l'un d'eux atterrisse sur Rykad Majoris. Le gouverneur a pris des mesures de précaution en ordonnant de renforcer la sécurité et les installations les plus importantes... Tout le monde sait que, quand ça ne va pas, il vaut mieux doubler la garde. L'alerte a été donnée et on nous a envoyés ici pour sécuriser l'astroport... c'est d'ailleurs la seule raison pour laquelle on a réussi à tenir jusqu'ici. »
languages.original_text: "My unit was here when it all went to the groxes. The {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} linked to satellites reported sightings of strange voidships in the system. They were orbiting the star until one of them set course for landing on Rykad Majoris. The governor took precautionary measures and ordered to increase security at the key facilities — everyone knows that whenever something's not right, you better double the warden details. The alarm was raised, and we were sent to secure the starport. It's the only reason we were able to hold it."

traits.locale_text: « Mon unité était là quand ça a commencé à partir en grox. Les {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}technoprêtres{/g} liés aux satellites ont signalé d'étranges vaisseaux spatiaux dans le système, orbitant autour de l'étoile jusqu'à ce que l'un d'eux atterrisse sur Rykad Majoris. Le gouverneur a pris des mesures de précaution en ordonnant de renforcer la sécurité et les installations les plus importantes... Tout le monde sait que, quand ça ne va pas, il vaut mieux doubler la garde. L'alerte a été donnée et on nous a envoyés ici pour sécuriser l'astroport... c'est d'ailleurs la seule raison pour laquelle on a réussi à tenir jusqu'ici. »

languages.text: “我的部队赶到的时候，一切都已经一团糟了。负责卫星的{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技术神甫{/g}报告说，他们在星系里观测到一群古怪的虚空舰。它们一直绕着这颗恒星轨道飞行，后来其中一艘在莱卡德主星着陆。总督采取了预防措施，下令加强关键设施的防备力量。所有人都知道，如果有什么地方不太对劲，那你最好打起两倍的精神，仔细警戒。后来警报响了，我们被派去保护星港。如您所见，我们依然在努力抵抗敌人。”
languages.original_text: "My unit was here when it all went to the groxes. The {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} linked to satellites reported sightings of strange voidships in the system. They were orbiting the star until one of them set course for landing on Rykad Majoris. The governor took precautionary measures and ordered to increase security at the key facilities — everyone knows that whenever something's not right, you better double the warden details. The alarm was raised, and we were sent to secure the starport. It's the only reason we were able to hold it."

traits.locale_text: “我的部队赶到的时候，一切都已经一团糟了。负责卫星的{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技术祭司{/g}报告说，他们在星系里观测到一群古怪的虚空舰。它们一直绕着这颗恒星轨道飞行，后来其中一艘在莱卡德主星着陆。总督采取了预防措施，下令加强关键设施的防备力量。所有人都知道，如果有什么地方不太对劲，那你最好打起两倍的精神，仔细警戒。后来警报响了，我们被派去保护星港。如您所见，我们依然在努力抵抗敌人。”

languages.text: 「私の部隊は、何もかもひどい状況になったとき、ここにいました。衛星に接続された{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技術司祭{/g}が、星系で奇妙なヴォイドシップを目撃したと報告したのです。そのうち1隻がライカド・マジョリスに着陸する進路を取るまで、彼らは星の周りを回っていました。総督は予防措置を講じ、主要施設の警備を強化するよう命じました。何か問題があるときはいつでも、ワーデンの監視体制を倍増した方がいいのは当たり前ですから。警報が発令されて、我々はスターポートの警備に駆り出されました。それがあったおかげで、我々は持ち堪えることができたのです」
languages.original_text: "My unit was here when it all went to the groxes. The {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} linked to satellites reported sightings of strange voidships in the system. They were orbiting the star until one of them set course for landing on Rykad Majoris. The governor took precautionary measures and ordered to increase security at the key facilities — everyone knows that whenever something's not right, you better double the warden details. The alarm was raised, and we were sent to secure the starport. It's the only reason we were able to hold it."

traits.locale_text: 「私の部隊は、何もかもひどい状況になってここに来ました。衛星に接続された{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技術司祭{/g}が、星系で奇妙なヴォイドシップを目撃したと報告したのです。そのうち1隻がライカド・マジョリスに着陸するコースを取るまで、彼らは星の周りを回っていました。総督は予防措置を講じ、主要施設の警備を強化するよう命じました。何か問題があるときはいつでも、ワーデンの詳細情報を倍にした方がいいのは当たり前ですから。警報が発令されて、我々はスターポートの警備に駆り出されました。それがあったおかげで、我々は持ち堪えることができたのです」

languages.text: «Mi unidad estaba aquí cuando todo acabó en los grox. Los {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tecnosacerdotes{/g} vinculados a los satélites informaron de avistamientos de extrañas naves del vacío en el sistema. Estuvieron orbitando la estrella hasta que uno de ellos fijó el rumbo para aterrizar en Rykad Majoris. El gobernador tomó medidas preventivas y ordenó aumentar la seguridad en las instalaciones más importantes. Todo el mundo sabe que, cuando algo no va bien, más vale duplicar la vigilancia. Se dio la alarma y nos enviaron a asegurar el puerto estelar. Es la única razón por la que pudimos resistir».
languages.original_text: "My unit was here when it all went to the groxes. The {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} linked to satellites reported sightings of strange voidships in the system. They were orbiting the star until one of them set course for landing on Rykad Majoris. The governor took precautionary measures and ordered to increase security at the key facilities — everyone knows that whenever something's not right, you better double the warden details. The alarm was raised, and we were sent to secure the starport. It's the only reason we were able to hold it."

traits.locale_text: «Mi unidad estaba aquí cuando todo acabó en los grox. Los {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tecnosacerdotes{/g} vinculados a los satélites informaron de avistamientos de extrañas naves del vacío en el sistema. Estuvieron orbitando la estrella hasta que uno de ellos fijó el rumbo para aterrizar en Rykad Majoris. Se dio la alarma y nos enviaron a asegurar el puerto estelar. Es la única razón por la que pudimos resistir».

languages.text: "İşler groksa sardığında birliğim buradaydı. Uydulara bağlı {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tekno Rahipler{/g}, sistemde tuhaf uçsuz gemilerinin görüldüğünü bildirdi. Yıldızın yörüngesindeydiler, sonra biri Rykad Minoris'e inmek üzere rota değiştirdi. Vali ihtiyati tedbirler aldı ve önemli tesislerde güvenliği artırma emri verdi. Herkes bilir ki bir sıkıntı baş gösterdiğinde dizdarları iki katına çıkarmak en akıllıca harekettir. Alarm verilince de yıldız limanının güvenliğini sağlamaya gönderildik. Bu yüzden burası hâlâ elimizde ya."
languages.original_text: "My unit was here when it all went to the groxes. The {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g} linked to satellites reported sightings of strange voidships in the system. They were orbiting the star until one of them set course for landing on Rykad Majoris. The governor took precautionary measures and ordered to increase security at the key facilities — everyone knows that whenever something's not right, you better double the warden details. The alarm was raised, and we were sent to secure the starport. It's the only reason we were able to hold it."
